name: Cosmic Commando (Fink)
description:
Cosmic Commando is a 2D space action platformer as a cosmonaut in deep space. You find yourself and your ship on the cusp of destruction. Your craft has been overrun by an alien force and has been severely damaged. In a desperate effort to restart your ship’s engine, you must find and collect parts to repair your craft while facing an alien invasion. 

Development Team:

giohd - itch.io

DawsonMajors - itch.io

Game Was Submitted to Moon Jam Game Jam:

Results: Cosmic Commando by giohd for MoonRift Global MoonJam - itch.io
